page.description: Used to contain one or more Editors.

discussion.p: The *[ui:EditorSet]* container is a special type of container that contains one or more *[ui:Editor]* containers.

The *[ui:EditorSet]* container is used in mobile applications for grouping a collection of Editors together. An *[ui:EditorSet]* is required if you want to create editors for editing data in a FormView Control.
